com.amazon.device.associates
Class AssociatesAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.amazon.device.associates.AssociatesAPI

public class AssociatesAPI
extends java.lang.Object

This class initializes the Mobile Associates API, and prepares it for use in your app.

Method Detail

initialize

public static void initialize(AssociatesAPI.Config config)
This method is used to initialize ShoppingService and LinkService. This method must be called from Activity.onCreate. Any ShoppingService or LinkService method called before calling this method will throw an NotInitializedException.

Parameters:
config - The configuration to be used for initialization
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If config is null.
